quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
I love life and nothing intimidates me anymore.
I don't want anyone part of my love life besides me and the person I'm loving.
Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
Gift the love of your life with undistracted, untelevisioned, unhurried attentiveness.

You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
The sadest part of love life is when you cannot live with and without the one you love.
You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
The best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff that life is made of.
I dream this day of wondrous things, of peace and hope and pride. I dance my dance with life today, I'm filled with love inside.
When I have to cry, I think about my love life. When I have to laugh, I think about my love life.
Once in a lifetime true love comes in your life. That is made just for you and you should not lose that chance of grasping it.
Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.

Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisibleâ€”it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
It means much to have loved, to have been happy, to have laid my hand on the living Garden, even for a day.
A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
Love life. Live your life with joy so you may fill the world with joy. Let no one leave your presence without feeling the joy of life.
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
Life is like an echo; if you love life, it loves you back.
A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
